children.value: Overview
Headquartered in Los Angeles, California, Right Balance applies the latest technology and the best engineering practices to help businesses grow. We’re in the top 50 companies to watch in LA
Role Overview

We’re looking for a strong account associate to join our team. As an Account Associate, you’ll be the backbone of our management team helping technology startups scale to greater heights. You’ll be working tightly with your Account Manager to source talent, present opportunities, handle objections, and coordinate interviews alongside other activities in our process.
If you are an enthusiastic administrative professional that is always looking to deliver high-quality work through thoughtful planning and careful attention to detail then this opportunity is for you. Being effective to follow through and your capability to manage multiple projects is key to success in this role. As a focused and organized problem solver who anticipates needs and thrives in a fast-paced environment, you’ll be able to make meaningful contributions in a tight team of seasoned executives.
What’s in it for you
Work with open-minded startup professionals on new and exciting ideas.
Career growth opportunities in a rapidly growing company.
Opportunity to evolve the account executive process for the entire organization.
Working directly with the executive level making meaningful contributions.
Work remotely at the comfort of your home or a shared co-working space.
Being able to help real companies make a positive impact globally.
Required Qualifications
3+ years of full-time experience in sales.
Conversational verbal level of English.
Ability to work in the US time zone.
Attention to detail and the ability to keep things on schedule regardless of obstacles.
Strong ability to manage multiple calendars and complex scheduling for multiple people.
Relentless drive to do whatever it takes to accomplish things on time and with quality.
Being immune to rejection and having thick skin.
Proactive communication, ability to take ownership, and improve the existing processes.
Passion for technology, curiosity about new ways to automate manual processes with technology tools.
Nice to haves
Experience hiring for US-based startups.
Experience working with startups at the growth stage.
Experience working in a software development firm.
Bachelor’s degree in business or related field.
Master-level negotiator.
Expert level sourcer.
Deep familiarity with different developer profiles (front end vs backend, senior vs mid-level, team lead vs individual contributor, Python API developer vs Python Data Engineer, etc).
Frequently Asked Questions
What are your typical clients?

The majority of our clients are venture-backed startups at the growth stage. Usually, at this stage, the company already achieved a product-market fit and is looking to expand rapidly. That’s where we bring the best engineering practices, strong architecture, the latest technologies, and consistent processes to help companies scale.
What’s your company size?
The Right Balance team is 60+ people growing to 100+ people by the end of the year.
What are your core values?
Client First: we only win when our clients win. We treat client challenges as our own.
Ownership: we embrace responsibility, taking on challenges, getting them to completion, and enjoying getting things done.
Quality: we’re passionate about achieving quality outcomes by applying meticulous attention to detail.
